verses.verse: Be not you envious <S%H7065><s%> against evil <S%H7451><s%> men, <S%H582><s%> neither <S%H408><s%> desire <S%H183><s%> to be with them.
For their heart <S%H3820><s%> studies <S%H1897><s%> destruction, <S%H7701><s%> and their lips <S%H8193><s%> talk <S%H1696><s%> of mischief. <S%H5999><s%>
Through wisdom <S%H2451><s%> is an house <S%H1004><s%> built; <S%H1129><s%> and by understanding <S%H8394><s%> it is established: <S%H3559><s%>
And by knowledge <S%H1847><s%> shall the chambers <S%H2315><s%> be filled <S%H4390><s%> with all <S%H3605><s%> precious <S%H3368><s%> and pleasant <S%H5273><s%> riches. <S%H1952><s%>
A wise <S%H2450><s%> man <S%H1397><s%> is strong; <S%H5797><s%> yes, a man <S%H376><s%> of knowledge <S%H1847><s%> increases <S%H553><s%> strength. <S%H3581><s%>
For by wise counsel <S%H8458><s%> you shall make your war: <S%H4421><s%> and in multitude <S%H7230><s%> of counsellors <S%H3289><s%> there is safety. <S%H8668><s%>
Wisdom <S%H2454><s%> is too high <S%H7311><s%> for a fool: <S%H191><s%> he opens <S%H6605><s%> not his mouth <S%H6310><s%> in the gate. <S%H8179><s%>
He that devises <S%H2803><s%> to do evil <S%H7489><s%> shall be called <S%H7121><s%> a mischievous <S%H4209><s%> person. <S%H1167><s%>
The thought <S%H2154><s%> of foolishness <S%H200><s%> is sin: <S%H2403><s%> and the scorner <S%H3887><s%> is an abomination <S%H8441><s%> to men. <S%H120><s%>
If you faint <S%H7503><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> of adversity, <S%H6869><s%> your strength <S%H3581><s%> is small. <S%H6862><s%>
If you forbear <S%H2820><s%> to deliver <S%H5337><s%> them that are drawn <S%H3947><s%> to death, <S%H4194><s%> and those that are ready <S%H4131><s%> to be slain; <S%H2027><s%>

If <S%H3588><s%> you say, <S%H559><s%> Behold, <S%H2005><s%> we knew <S%H3045><s%> it not; does not he that ponders <S%H8505><s%> the heart <S%H3826><s%> consider <S%H995><s%> it? and he that keeps <S%H5341><s%> your soul, <S%H5315><s%> does not he know <S%H3045><s%> it? and shall not he render <S%H7725><s%> to every man <S%H120><s%> according to his works? <S%H6467><s%>

My son, <S%H1121><s%> eat <S%H398><s%> you honey, <S%H1706><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> it is good; <S%H2896><s%> and the honeycomb, <S%H5317><s%> which is sweet <S%H4966><s%> to your taste: <S%H2441><s%>

So <S%H3651><s%> shall the knowledge <S%H3045><s%> of wisdom <S%H2451><s%> be to your soul: <S%H5315><s%> when <S%H518><s%> you have found <S%H4672><s%> it, then there shall be a reward, <S%H319><s%> and your expectation <S%H8615><s%> shall not be cut <S%H3772><s%> off.
Lay not wait, <S%H693><s%> O wicked <S%H7563><s%> man, against the dwelling <S%H5116><s%> of the righteous; <S%H6662><s%> spoil <S%H7703><s%> not his resting <S%H7258><s%> place:
For a just <S%H6662><s%> man falls <S%H5307><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> times, and rises <S%H6965><s%> up again: but the wicked <S%H7563><s%> shall fall <S%H3782><s%> into mischief. <S%H7451><s%>
Rejoice <S%H8055><s%> not when your enemy <S%H341><s%> falls, <S%H5307><s%> and let not your heart <S%H3820><s%> be glad <S%H1523><s%> when he stumbles: <S%H3782><s%>
Lest <S%H6435><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> see <S%H7200><s%> it, and it displease <S%H7489><s%> <S%H5869><s%> him, and he turn <S%H7725><s%> away his wrath <S%H639><s%> from him.
Fret <S%H2734><s%> not yourself because of evil <S%H7489><s%> men, neither <S%H408><s%> be you envious <S%H7065><s%> at the wicked: <S%H7563><s%>
For there shall be no <S%H3808><s%> reward <S%H319><s%> to the evil <S%H7451><s%> man; the candle <S%H5216><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> shall be put <S%H1846><s%> out.
My son, <S%H1121><s%> fear <S%H3372><s%> you the LORD <S%H3068><s%> and the king: <S%H4428><s%> and meddle <S%H6148><s%> not with them that are given to change: <S%H8138><s%>
For their calamity <S%H343><s%> shall rise <S%H6965><s%> suddenly; <S%H6597><s%> and who <S%H4310><s%> knows <S%H3045><s%> the ruin <S%H6365><s%> of them both? <S%H8147><s%>
These <S%H428><s%> things also <S%H1571><s%> belong to the wise. <S%H2450><s%> It is not good <S%H2896><s%> to have respect <S%H5234><s%> of persons <S%H6440><s%> in judgment. <S%H4941><s%>
He that said <S%H559><s%> to the wicked, <S%H7563><s%> You are righteous; <S%H6662><s%> him shall the people <S%H5971><s%> curse, <S%H5344><s%> nations <S%H3816><s%> shall abhor <S%H2194><s%> him:
But to them that rebuke <S%H3198><s%> him shall be delight, <S%H5276><s%> and a good <S%H2896><s%> blessing <S%H1293><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%> on them.
Every man shall kiss <S%H5401><s%> his lips <S%H8193><s%> that gives a right <S%H5228><s%> answer. <S%H7725><s%> <S%H1697><s%>

Prepare <S%H3559><s%> your work <S%H4399><s%> without, <S%H2351><s%> and make it fit <S%H6257><s%> for yourself in the field; <S%H7704><s%> and afterwards <S%H310><s%> build <S%H1129><s%> your house. <S%H1004><s%>
Be not a witness <S%H5707><s%> against your neighbor <S%H7453><s%> without <S%H2600><s%> cause; <S%H2600><s%> and deceive <S%H6601><s%> not with your lips. <S%H8193><s%>
Say <S%H559><s%> not, I will do <S%H6213><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> to him as he has done <S%H6213><s%> to me: I will render <S%H7725><s%> to the man <S%H376><s%> according to his work. <S%H6467><s%>
I went <S%H5674><s%> by the field <S%H7704><s%> of the slothful, <S%H6102><s%> and by the vineyard <S%H3754><s%> of the man <S%H120><s%> void <S%H2638><s%> of understanding; <S%H3820><s%>

And, see, <S%H2009><s%> it was all <S%H3605><s%> grown <S%H5927><s%> over <S%H5927><s%> with thorns, <S%H7063><s%> and nettles <S%H2738><s%> had covered <S%H3680><s%> the face <S%H6440><s%> thereof, and the stone <S%H68><s%> wall <S%H1444><s%> thereof was broken <S%H2040><s%> down. <S%H2040><s%>
Then I saw, <S%H2372><s%> and considered <S%H7896><s%> <S%H3820><s%> it well: I looked <S%H7200><s%> on it, and received <S%H3947><s%> instruction. <S%H4148><s%>
Yet a little <S%H4592><s%> sleep, <S%H8142><s%> a little <S%H4592><s%> slumber, <S%H8572><s%> a little <S%H4592><s%> folding <S%H2264><s%> of the hands <S%H3027><s%> to sleep: <S%H7901><s%>
So <S%H3651><s%> shall your poverty <S%H7389><s%> come <S%H935><s%> as one that travels; <S%H1980><s%> and your want <S%H4270><s%> as an armed <S%H4043><s%> man. <S%H376><s%>
